::: {#hero-heading}

Junze Lin is a 4th year Ph.D. student in Economics at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. His research interests lie in the field of Political Economics, Law and Economics and the effect of Monetary Policy with different Financial Networks. 

## Education
- 2022 - Present: Ph.D. Student, Economics,  
  University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
- 2021 - 2022: M.S., Policy Economics,  
  University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
- 2017 - 2021: B.S., Mathematics and Applied Mathematics,  
  Beijing University of Technology

## Interests
- Political Economics
- Law and Economics
- Monetary Policy and Financial Networks
- Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing

:::
